sentences.sentence: But excluding acquisitions, shipments of OTP were down by 12.2 per cent, primarily due to lower cigarillo volumes in Germany where this entire segment declined.
sentences.translation: 但是，主要由于德国的小雪茄销量因这个产品部分全线下滑而减少，不包括并购，其他烟草产品的装运量下降了12.2%。

sentences.sentence: And it would define more tightly the terms cigarette, cigar, cigarillo, fine-cut tobacco and pipe tobacco in order to discourage the production of cross-over products.
sentences.translation: 而且这项提案还更严格地定义了卷烟、雪茄、小雪茄、细切烟和斗烟这些词语，以阻止交叉产品的生产。
